<Heading

>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/governance/lifecycle/bulk-operations"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Creates a new bulk operation to transition multiple objects to a target state.
Maximum of 1000 objects per operation.
